attributes.action: Charge non British citzens for public services and cut down immigration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister
Immigration as we know is a growing problem.  I could understand if the
 UK were the size of Australia etc but we are not.  If we were I would
 have no trouble with it but we are a small nation and overflowing, it
 is draining public resources such as the NHS, prisons, social services
 etc.  Tony Blair said that he would kick out thousands of illegals and
 this is not happening.  One way of cutting down if we are scared of
 kicking out is to charge non British citizens for these services espically
 the NHS, this i'm sure would cut down the numbers and include EU
 members in this. The points system for entering is a joke, our American
 friends need points but non English speaking europeans don't, something
 wrong there I think!!
You had Mrs Thatcher to No 10 recently I hope you can at some stage
 become as strong a leader and actually sort this out.

I was a staunch Tory before you took over, but I saw something in you
 that I like as a leader, so come on put Britian and the British first
 for a change.  If not it leaves me no vote at all after all I refuse to
 vote for a wet liberal and Mr Cameron is going so far left in his
 efforts to please the minorites I fully expect Tony Benn to change colour
 soon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
